heading: DevFest 2025
description: Join us for the biggest developer festival of the year! DevFest 2025 brings together developers, designers, and tech enthusiasts for a day of learning, networking, and fun. Explore the latest in web development, mobile apps, AI/ML, and cloud technologies.

heading: Android Study Jam 2025
description: Learn Android development from scratch in this intensive study jam. Build your first Android app and get certified by Google. Perfect for beginners who want to start their mobile development journey.
